title: Bonanza : The Blood Line (1960) Lee Van Cleef | A Son’s Fury, a Father’s Legacy

sources.title: Bonanza : The Blood Line (1960) Lee Van Cleef | A Son’s Fury, a Father’s Legacy
sources.description:
In episode 47 of Bonanza, 16-year-old Todd Grayson (David Macklin) arrives in Virginia City seeking vengeance against Ben Cartwright for the death of his father, Luke. Despite Ben's act of self-defense, Todd is consumed by anger and determined to settle the score. Guest stars include Jan Sterling as Dianne Jordan and Lee Van Cleef as the hired gunman,

Director: Lewis Allen
Writers: William Raynor, Myles Wilder
Starring: Lorne Greene, Dan Blocker, David Macklin, Jan Sterling, Lee Van Cleef
Genres: Classic Western, Cult TV


Explore more classic episodes:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdaNPO6sxm0su5BWq2dZBMZ7
